content.text: I'm going to India soon! Can you recommend me places to visit?

Sure, there are so many amazing places to visit in India! If you're looking for something cultural, you can visit the Taj Mahal or the Golden Temple. If you're looking for something more adventurous, you can go trekking in the Himalayas or go surfing in Goa.
Wow, those all sound amazing! I'm excited to see what India has to offer.
I'm sure you'll love it! What kind of music do you like?
I like all sorts of music, but my favorite band is VNV Nation.
I've never heard of them before, but I'll check them out! What do you like about their music?
I like the way they combine electronic music with classical elements. It's really unique and atmospheric.
That sounds really cool! I'll definitely have to check them out.
You should! I think you'll like them.
